channel.title: Miniconda on Kip Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in Miniconda on Kip Jiang

item.title: Jupyter Notebook on Remote Server
item.description: Install miniconda 参考 Working With Ubuntu (2) Configure Jypyter Note: 通过 ssh 远程链接到服务器操作。 安装 jupyter notebook $ conda install jupyter notebook 生成配置文件 $ jupyter notebook --generate-config Writing default config to: /home/kip/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py 通过 ipython 生成密码的 Hash $ ipython Python 3.6.9 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Mar 31 2020, 19:07:31) Type 'copyright', 'credits' or 'license' for more information IPython 7.7.0 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. Type '?

item.title: Working with Ubuntu (2)
item.description: 如何在 Ubuntu 中安装一些开发软件。 VScode VSCode 的安装非常简单 $ sudo snap install --classic code code a622c65b from Visual Studio Code (vscode✓) installed 打开 $ code Sublime Text 3 Reference：Linux Package Manager Repositories Install the GPG key: wget -qO - https://download.sublimetext.com/sublimehq-pub.gpg | sudo apt-key add - Ensure apt is set up to work with https sources: sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https Select the channel to use: Stable
